name: thedailybeast
text:
Mr. Rogers' widow, Joanne, told The Daily Beast that Fred always avoided talking about politics for fear it would complicate the lives of kids at home.

But Joanne had no problem making her feelings about Trump clear: “I think he’s just a horrible person.” https://t.co/cWud6EMqzQ

name: thedailybeast
text: Apple lost $179.92 billion in market value in a stock selloff that saw the Nasdaq slump by 5%, the S&P 500 by 3.5%, and the Dow by 2.8% https://t.co/oMo4cez6z6

name: thedailybeast
text: George Washington University historian Jessica Krug revealed in a Medium post that she’s lived under “various assumed identities within a Blackness that I had no right to claim” https://t.co/KVbawv6hRZ

text: A lawyer for pop star Britney Spears has filed to unseal documents related to the conservatorship that governs her business affairs, TMZ reports https://t.co/PcoEKdvwNr

name: thedailybeast
text: Joe Biden, Trump’s Democratic opponent in the upcoming presidential election, said if the report was true the president's comments are “yet another marker of how deeply President Trump and I disagree about the role of the President of the United States.”  https://t.co/hZH5TVaH6m
